item.text: “These are the ordinances that you will set before them:
“If you buy a Hebrew servant, he is to serve you for six years, but in the seventh year he will go out free without paying anything.

<st data-num="0518" class="">If</st> he <st data-num="0935" class="">came in</st><n id="1" /> by <st data-num="01610" class="">himself</st><n id="2" /> he will <st data-num="03318" class="">go out</st> by <st data-num="01610" class="">himself</st>; <st data-num="0518" class="">if</st> <st data-num="01931" class="">he</st> <st data-num="01167" class="">had</st><n id="3" /> a <st data-num="0802" class="">wife</st> when he came in, then his <st data-num="0802" class="">wife</st> will <st data-num="03318" class="">go out</st> <st data-num="05973" class="">with</st> him.

<st data-num="0518" class="">If</st> his <st data-num="0113" class="">master</st> <st data-num="05414" class="">gave</st><n id="1" /> him a <st data-num="0802" class="">wife</st>, and she <st data-num="03205" class="">bore</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">sons</st> <st data-num="0176" class="">or</st> <st data-num="01323" class="">daughters</st>, the <st data-num="0802" class="">wife</st> and the <st data-num="03206" class="">children</st> will <st data-num="01961" class="">belong</st> to her <st data-num="0113" class="">master</st>, and <st data-num="01931" class="">he</st> will <st data-num="03318" class="">go out</st> by <st data-num="01610" class="">himself</st>.

But <st data-num="0518" class="">if</st> the <st data-num="05650" class="">servant</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">should</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">declare</st>,<n id="1" /> ‘I <st data-num="0157" class="">love</st> my <st data-num="0113" class="">master</st>, my <st data-num="0802" class="">wife</st>, and my <st data-num="01121" class="">children</st>; I will <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="03318" class="">go out</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="02670" class="">free</st>,’
then his master must bring him to the judges, and he will bring him to the door or the doorpost, and his master will pierce his ear with an awl, and he shall serve him forever.
“If a man sells his daughter as a female servant, she will not go out as the male servants do.

<st data-num="0518" class="">If</st> she does <st data-num="07451" class="">not</st> <st data-num="05869" class="">please</st><n id="1" /> her <st data-num="0113" class="">master</st>, <st data-num="0834" class="">who</st> has <st data-num="03259" class="">designated</st> her<n id="2" /> for himself, then he must let her be <st data-num="06299" class="">redeemed</st>.<n id="3" /> He has <st data-num="03808" class="">no</st> <st data-num="04910" class="">right</st><n id="4" /> to <st data-num="04376" class="">sell</st> her to a <st data-num="05237" class="">foreign</st> <st data-num="05971" class="">nation</st>, because he has <st data-num="0898" class="">dealt deceitfully</st><n id="5" /> with her.

<st data-num="0518" class="">If</st> he <st data-num="03259" class="">designated</st> her for his <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st>, then he will <st data-num="06213" class="">deal</st> with her according to the <st data-num="04941" class="">customary rights</st><n id="1" /> of <st data-num="01323" class="">daughters</st>.

<st data-num="0518" class="">If</st> he <st data-num="03947" class="">takes</st> <st data-num="0312" class="">another</st> wife,<n id="1" /> he must <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="01639" class="">diminish</st> the first one’s <st data-num="07607" class="">food</st>,<n id="2" /> her <st data-num="03682" class="">clothing</st>, or her <st data-num="05772" class="">marital rights</st>.<n id="3" />
If he does not provide her with these three things, then she will go out free, without paying money.
“Whoever strikes someone so that he dies must surely be put to death.

But if <st data-num="0834" class="">he</st> does <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> do it <st data-num="06658" class="">with premeditation</st>,<n id="1" /> but <st data-num="0430" class="">it</st> <st data-num="0579" class="">happens</st> by <st data-num="03027" class="">accident</st>,<n id="2" /> then I will <st data-num="07760" class="">appoint</st> for you a <st data-num="04725" class="">place</st> <st data-num="0834 08033" class="">where</st> he may <st data-num="05127" class="">flee</st>.
But if a man willfully attacks his neighbor to kill him cunningly, you will take him even from my altar that he may die.
“Whoever strikes his father or his mother must surely be put to death.
“Whoever kidnaps someone and sells him, or is caught still holding him, must surely be put to death.
“Whoever treats his father or his mother disgracefully must surely be put to death.
“If men fight, and one strikes his neighbor with a stone or with his fist and he does not die, but must remain in bed,
and then if he gets up and walks about outside on his staff, then the one who struck him is innocent, except he must pay for the injured person’s loss of time and see to it that he is fully healed.
“If a man strikes his male servant or his female servant with a staff so that he or she dies as a result of the blow, he will surely be punished.
However, if the injured servant survives one or two days, the owner will not be punished, for he has suffered the loss.

“If men fight and hit a pregnant woman and her child is born prematurely, but there is no serious injury, the one who hit her will surely be punished in accordance with what the woman’s husband demands of him, and he will pay what the court decides.

But <st data-num="0518" class="">if</st> there <st data-num="01961" class="">is</st> <st data-num="0611" class="">serious injury</st>, then you will <st data-num="05414" class="">give</st> a <st data-num="05315" class="">life</st> <st data-num="08478" class="">for</st> a <st data-num="05315" class="">life</st>,

<st data-num="05869" class="">eye</st> <st data-num="08478" class="">for</st> <st data-num="05869" class="">eye</st>, <st data-num="08127" class="">tooth</st> <st data-num="08478" class="">for</st> <st data-num="08127" class="">tooth</st>, <st data-num="03027" class="">hand</st> <st data-num="08478" class="">for</st> <st data-num="03027" class="">hand</st>, <st data-num="07272" class="">foot</st> <st data-num="08478" class="">for</st> <st data-num="07272" class="">foot</st>,
burn for burn, wound for wound, bruise for bruise.
“If a man strikes the eye of his male servant or his female servant so that he destroys it, he will let the servant go free as compensation for the eye.
If he knocks out the tooth of his male servant or his female servant, he will let the servant go free as compensation for the tooth.
“If an ox gores a man or a woman so that either dies, then the ox must surely be stoned and its flesh must not be eaten, but the owner of the ox will be acquitted.

But <st data-num="0518" class="">if</st> the <st data-num="07794" class="">ox</st> <st data-num="05056 08543 08032">had the habit of goring</st>, and its <st data-num="01167" class="">owner</st> was <st data-num="05749" class="">warned</st><n id="1" /> but he did <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="08104" class="">take the necessary precautions</st>,<n id="2" /> and then it <st data-num="04191" class="">killed</st> a <st data-num="0376" class="">man</st> <st data-num="0176" class="">or</st> a <st data-num="0802" class="">woman</st>, the <st data-num="07794" class="">ox</st> must be <st data-num="05619" class="">stoned</st> <st data-num="01571" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="01167" class="">man</st> must be <st data-num="04191" class="">put to death</st>.

<st data-num="0518" class="">If</st> a <st data-num="03724" class="">ransom</st> is <st data-num="07896" class="">set</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">for</st> him,<n id="1" /> then he must <st data-num="05414" class="">pay</st> the <st data-num="06306" class="">redemption</st> for his <st data-num="05315" class="">life</st> according to <st data-num="0834" class="">whatever</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">amount</st> was <st data-num="07896" class="">set</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">for</st> him.

<st data-num="0176" class="">If</st> the ox<n id="1" /> <st data-num="05055" class="">gores</st> a <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> <st data-num="0176" class="">or</st> a <st data-num="01323" class="">daughter</st>, the owner<n id="2" /> will be <st data-num="06213" class="">dealt</st> with according to <st data-num="02088" class="">this</st> <st data-num="04941" class="">rule</st>.<n id="3" />
If the ox gores a male servant or a female servant, the owner must pay thirty shekels of silver, and the ox must be stoned.
“If a man opens a pit or if a man digs a pit and does not cover it and an ox or a donkey falls into it,

the <st data-num="01167" class="">owner</st> of the <st data-num="0953" class="">pit</st> must <st data-num="07999">repay the loss</st>.<n id="1" /> He must <st data-num="07725" class="">give</st> <st data-num="03701" class="">money</st><n id="2" /> to its <st data-num="01167" class="">owner</st>, and the <st data-num="04191" class="">dead</st> animal<n id="3" /> will <st data-num="01961" class="">become</st> his.

<st data-num="03588" class="">If</st> the <st data-num="07794" class="">ox</st> of one <st data-num="0376" class="">man</st> <st data-num="05062" class="">injures</st> the <st data-num="07794" class="">ox</st> of his <st data-num="07453" class="">neighbor</st> so that it <st data-num="04191" class="">dies</st>, then they will <st data-num="04376" class="">sell</st> the <st data-num="02416" class="">live</st> <st data-num="07794" class="">ox</st> and <st data-num="02673" class="">divide</st> its <st data-num="03701" class="">proceeds</st>,<n id="1" /> and they will <st data-num="01571" class="">also</st> <st data-num="02673" class="">divide</st> the <st data-num="04191" class="">dead</st> ox.<n id="2" />
Or if it is known that the ox had the habit of goring, and its owner did not take the necessary precautions, he must surely pay ox for ox, and the dead animal will become his.
